name: Challenge #10: Optimal delivery.
description: What is the best route to deliver all Passengers?! Your objetive: Find out the best route to deliver all 10 Passengers. Don't forget the one who is isolated at City "J"! Also, no random Passengers this time.
helpText: This is the classic Travelling Salesman Problem;
Only the best route will win this challenge.
The optimal route will win this challenge in under 30 seconds
This is the last challenge, the Big boss! Don't give up.

victory.text: Deliver all the passengers to their desired destination.
victory.function: function (vehicles, cities, passengers, game) { return game.passengersDelivered == 10 }

defeat.text: Timer must not go over 30 seconds
defeat.function: function (vehicles, cities, passengers, game) { return game.elapsedTimeSeconds > 30; }
